DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate dose-response relationship AVE0010 administer daily twice daily chronic dose metformin-treated subject type 2 diabetes
DOC.brief_title: Dose Ranging Study GLP-1 Agonist AVE0010 Metformin-Treated Subjects With Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus
DOC.criteria: Males , female , age 30 , 75 year , type 2 diabetes mellitus , treat metformin ≥1.0 g/day , stable dose least 3 month , BMI 25 40 kg/m2 , HbA1C ≥7.0 % < 9.0 % . Type 1 diabetes , pregnancy , lactation , woman childbearing potential , treatment antidiabetic agent metformin , history metabolic acidosis , hemoglobinopathy hemolytic anemia , clinically significant medical abnormality .
